articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Co-op Farms in Hwangju County
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Co-op Farms in Hwangju County
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju inspected Sokjong and Ryongchon co-op farms in Hwangju County of North Hwanghae Province to learn in detail about the drought damage.
					 He encouraged the officials and working people in a dynamic struggle to prevent the drought damage.
					
					 Consultative meetings were convened to take steps to employ the effective way of preventing the drought damage, find the source of water and, at the same time, for ministries and national institutions to provide co-op farms with vehicles and materials necessary for anti-drought campaign on a priority basis.

articles.title: C.C., WPK Congratulates Cambodian Party on Its Anniversary
articles.content:
C.C., WPK Congratulates Cambodian Party on Its Anniversary
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Tuesday sent a message of greeting to the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia on its 66th birthday.
					 The message said that the WPK Central Committee is rejoiced over the signal achievements made by the People's Party of Cambodia in the work for national reconciliation and unity and the independent development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would steadily develop in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, it wished the Cambodian party bigger success in its activities for strengthening itself and building prosperous Cambodia.

articles.title: Indonesian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Indonesian Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Bambang Hiendrasto Monday gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club, on behalf of embassies of member states of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) here, as regards the end of Ramadan.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Hui Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned and representatives and deputy representatives of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here.
					
					 On hand were the ambassadors of Indonesia, Syria, Iran, Palestine and Egypt and charges d' affaires ad interim of Nigeria and Pakistan, OIC member states, and embassy officials and their families.
					
					 Choe Hui Chol said at the reception that under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the Korean army and people have preserved peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and worked new miracles day by day in all fields of building a socialist power while resolutely smashing the hostile forces' sanctions and pressure.
					
					 He affirmed the steadfast stand of the DPRK government to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the OIC member states with long history and tradition in all fields as required by the new century.
					
					 The diplomatic envoys of OIC member states expressed their will to strive to strengthen the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation developing on good terms day by day, irrespective of the change in the situation.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the first anniversary of his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, handed the basket and letter to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Here Visit Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Here Visit Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital Tuesday on the occasion of the first anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Being briefed on the hospital which was built as a multi-functional and comprehensive medial service center for the people, the members of the corps went round outpatient ward, glasses shop and other parts of it.
					
					 Then, they toured the Pyongyang Bag Factory.

articles.title: Day of Anti-U.S Struggle Marked across Korea
articles.content:
Day of Anti-U.S Struggle Marked across Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in different cities and counties of the DPRK to mark the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 Present there were officials of party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities and working citizens and youth and students in the local areas.
					
					 Speakers referred to the facts that the U.S. imperialists ignited a war against the DPRK on June 25, 1950 and committed an unheard-of genocide and indiscriminate destruction.
					
					 The Korean army and people brought disgraceful defeat to the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history by turning out in the sacred war to defend their country, they said.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. imperialists have made ceaseless attempt to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from their shameful defeat in the Korean War, the speakers expressed the will to bring the final doom to the aggressors if they ignite another war on this land.
					
					 Then followed public processions.

articles.title: Campaign for Preventing Drought Damage Brisk in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Campaign for Preventing Drought Damage Brisk in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang City channels big efforts into watering paddy and dry fields, as part of the nationwide campaign for preventing drought damage.
					 On the basis of detailed survey of those drought-stricken or vulnerable fields, the city rural economy committee has taken due measures to flow them.
					
					 And cooperative farms in the city are pushing ahead with the weeding, plowing and spraying foliar nutrients.
					
					 All the industrial establishments in the city have also turned out in watering cultivated lands by mobilizing manpower and water-supply wagons.
					
					 Its districts, counties and cooperative farms have pushed forward such projects for securing water resources as building dammed pools, enlarging small reservoirs and repairing or digging wells and tube-wells, while keeping all mobile water pumps in full-capacity operation.
					
					 Meanwhile, irrigation management stations are taking good care of irrigation facilities and structures.
					
					 Particularly, the cooperative farms in Mangyondae District and Ryokpho District have made achievements in overcoming drought by making effective use of water pumps and introducing new irrigation methods.

articles.title: Shop for Sportspersons Opens
articles.content:
Shop for Sportspersons Opens
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A shop for sportspersons was recently opened in Kwangbok Street, Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 On display at the first floor are various kinds of sports goods, foodstuffs, utensils and electronics products and at the second floor souvenirs, cosmetics, school things and daily necessities.
					
					 There is an electron gun range for children on the second floor.
					
					 What enjoy popularity among visitors are well-known goods made by the Pyongyang Sports Goods Factory, Wonsan Shoes Factory and other factories of the country.
					
					 The shop can also make sportswear on the spot as ordered by customers.
					
					 The shop is closely associated with the loving care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for the people.

articles.title: "American-first Principle"-Nazism in 21st Century Rejected
articles.content:
"American-first Principle"-Nazism in 21st Century Rejected
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released an article "We Reject 'American-first Principle'- Nazism in the 21st Century" on Monday to shed light on the criminal nature of "American-first principle" touted by the Trump group of the U.S.
					 The big chaos the world has been forced to undergo at the hand of ruthlessly high-handed and arbitrary practices of the present U.S. administration is a direct product of the "American-first principle" trumpeted about by the Trump administration, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The "American-first principle" is, in essence, the continuation and the expanded version of the hegemonic pursuance sought by the successive U.S. administrations.
					
					 This reactionary ideological trend stirs up extreme aggression and chauvinism by which they give the green-light to the violation of independence, the right to existence and the right to development of other countries and nations in order to serve the U.S. interests.
					
					 The idea is the American version of Nazism far surpassing the fascism in the last century in its ferocious, brutal and chauvinistic nature.
					
					 The "American-first principle" arouses denunciation by the public at home and abroad as it advocates the world domination by recourse to military means just as was the case with Hitler's concept of world occupation.
					
					 Just following Hitler's dictatorial politics, Trump's "two-nation strategy" justifies suppression after dividing nationals into two categories i.e. friends and foes. The strategy creates the atmosphere of horror among political, public, media, information and all other circles in the U.S., putting Trump, advocator of the idea, on the chopping board of impeachment himself.
					
					 Anti-immigration politics, little short of fascism's racist politics, has touched off aversion from big businesses which are gaining big benefits by relying on immigrated men of talents, and has sparked off derision by the world people as it denied the history of the U.S. itself, a multi-national and multi-racial country.
					
					 The world has never seen peace since the emergence of the "American-first principle".
					
					 After fixing it as the priority item of its policy for diplomacy and security to settle the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula, and setting the "maximum pressure and engagement" as its DPRK policy, the Trump administration has pressed for the unprecedented nuclear threat and blackmail and economic sanctions on the DPRK.
					
					 Its wild act of blocking even medical appliances and medications, to say nothing of even a drop of fuel oil, from entering the country, is an unethical and inhumane act, far exceeding the degree of Hitler's blockade of Leningrad.
					
					 The moves to contain potential rivals China and Russia and hold the region and the rest of the world under its control have reached the extremes under Trump rule.
					
					 The Trump group has caused the evil cycle of destruction, slaughter and instability even in the Mid-east.
					
					 The U.S. moves to stamp out anti-U.S. countries have complicated the situation in Latin-America, too.
					
					 The Trump way of thinking that the whole world may be sacrificed just for the better living of the U.S., has put even its allies and stooges in a pretty fix.
					
					 The U.S. wantonly violated the Paris agreement on preservation of earth environment as an extension of its moves of defying even international law and agreements.
					
					 It is quite natural that the international community brands the U.S. act of conniving at the indefinite emission of carbon dioxide for its own interests as "an act of putting into the shade Hitler's poisonous gas atrocity" and "a crime to annihilate humankind by turning green planet into a poisonous gas room as a whole".
					
					 All facts prove that the "American-first principle" which brings horror and instability to the world is just intervention and dangerous war-first principle which defy the principles of non-interference and peaceful co-existence.
					
					 The "American-first principle" whose purpose is to turn the human society of modern civilization into the wild world ruled by law of jungle represents the height of arrogance and arbitrariness.
					
					 Herein lies the crafty and ferocious nature of the "American-first principle" that stands out from the successive hegemonism.
					
					 The Yankee-way logic of hegemonism which claims everything has to exist to serve the U.S. is an anachronistic wild act and sophism that can no longer be effective in the era of independence where the sound way of thinking of humankind prevails.
					
					 The frantic ideology and forces harassing world peace and security and threatening the existence of human being have to be expelled from this planet. This is our demand and, at the same time, the urgent call of humankind.
					
					 All countries and nations have to fight against U.S. hegemonism.
					
					 U.S. hegemonism will face total bankruptcy in the face of justice and united strength.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Warns U.S. to Come to Its Senses
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Warns U.S. to Come to Its Senses
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has gone desperate in its military moves against the DPRK.
					 After bringing nuclear submarine and other war means into the waters off Guam the U.S. staged naval joint military drills targeting the DPRK with the south Korean puppet forces. Against this backdrop, on June 13, U.S. Defense Secretary Mattis made his appearance at a Congressional hearing and blustered that there is no change in the Trump administration's DPRK policy including military option.
					
					 This is the desperate frenzy of war fanatics. He grumbled before journalists in May last about "incredible tragedy that can be produced by confrontation with the north". Now he is again blustering for military blackmail, an indication of his fear, not demonstration of high spirits. 
					
					 The Trump group is upset to the extremes as it was made to drink bitter cup step by step by the DPRK remarkably building the power of justice.
					
					 The U.S. forces commander in south Korea confessed that "now it is a difficult situation to mount a preemptive attack on the north". As proven by this, the DPRK-U.S. stand-off structure has undergone a drastic change due to the remarkably strong state might and the strategic position of the DPRK which remains undeterred by the unprecedented nuclear threat and blackmail and economic sanctions.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. has no alternative that can prove effective. Shortly ago, the director of the CIA said "President Trump asks about north Korea every day and how to counter it", adding "the president is always thinking of north Korea".
					
					 Clear is from where his fear comes.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear sword is a direct product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Its nuclear blackmail moves is a key factor that compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes and nuclear weaponization.
					
					 Tragic is that the present U.S. administration is still obsessed by the ambition for stifling the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from the predecessors' failures and the undeniable situation today.
					
					 The Trump group had better pay heed to the voice of the international community that "most of nuclear and missile activities of north Korea since 2012 were carried out during the period of U.S.-south Korea joint military drills".
					
					 The U.S. should be mindful that its escalating confrontational racket and pressure will only invite stronger counteraction from the DPRK and accelerate its own final destruction.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Authorities to Properly Behave: for Improved Ties or Pursuit of Confrontation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Authorities to Properly Behave: for Improved Ties or Pursuit of Confrontation
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- These days the dreary situation in south Korea is stunning the public.
					 Days ago, the south Korean judicial authorities held the final hearing on an appeal at the Seoul High Court and demanded five years in prison for an inhabitant, who posted an article praising the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu on websites and called for reunification through alliance with the north, on charges of violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 Earlier on June 13, they held a trial of a reverend and sentenced him to three years in prison on charges of espionage that he was linked with the north during the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 These are an unpardonable crime against the public yearning for a new politics and life and a reckless action of swimming against the trend of the times toward improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities came to power by winning support from the candlelight demonstrators with call for improved north-south relations in the "presidential election".
					
					 However, no sooner had they taken office than they turned to the confrontation racket, staging more madcap war drills against the fellow countrymen by introducing two nuclear carrier strike groups of the U.S., far from mending the north-south relations.
					
					 They would say that they represent the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators and stand for "democratic reform". But in actuality they are invoking the evil law of the confrontational era which defines the fellow countrymen in the north as "enemy", just like the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye conservative groups.
					
					 It is not exaggeration to say that the present south Korean ruling quarters are victims of the modern "witch hunt". But they behave like a heir to the Park Geun Hye regime. This is a betrayal and open challenge to the candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 They outwardly call for "improved north-south relations," but inwardly crack down upon those who advocate independent reunification and support the dialogue partner. Such attitude is little short of declaration of their intention to go for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is high time that the south Korean authorities took a proper option; for improvement of the relations with the compatriots or confrontation with them.
					
					 If they really represent the candlelight demonstrators demanding the abolition of the evils in the old era, they should not enforce the anti-reunification confrontation evil law but take the lead in the struggle for its abolition and make a bold decision to promptly set free those who are detained on unreasonable charges.
					
					 Anyone failing to see the trend of the times and going against the public demand is bound to meet a miserable end finally.

articles.title: S. Korea-U.S. "Alliance" Is Noose of Subjugation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S. "Alliance" Is Noose of Subjugation: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korea-U.S. "alliance" is the noose of domination, subjugation and subordination, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The regime professing "democratic reform" appeared in south Korea, but voices of "stronger alliance" with the U.S. are still heard, it says.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" touted by the pro-U.S. stooges is that for subjugation to colonial domination, for a war to realize the strategy to dominate the world and for division which puts a brake on the country's reunification, the article goes on:
					
					 There can be no such thing as "alliance" between the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 After the defeat of the Japanese imperialists, the U.S. occupied south Korea and set up the pro-American puppet regime with its stooges.
					
					 It enforced the "military administration" in south Korea not to be applied in defeated Japan, established the American-style colonial domination system and built up the foundation to permanently occupy south Korea through shackling and unequal "agreements" and "treaties".
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" is the most aggressive and shackling unequal treaty in the history, the keynote of which is that the U.S. set the period of occupation as an indefinite period in a bid to not receive any limitation in turning south Korea into military base.
					
					 The U.S. is the chief criminal that divided Korea into two parts and has inflicted misfortune and disaster on its nation while disturbing the reunification of Korea.
					
					 There were not a few opportunities in the north and the south in the past that made all Koreans enthusiastic about national reunification and the whole country heated with reconciliation. But whenever such opportunities presented themselves, the U.S. deliberately aggravated the situation with military tension and war drills and manipulated behind the scene the puppet forces in a bid to let the north and the south steadily antagonize each other and pit the compatriots fight each other.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persistently swim against the trend of the times, talking about "strengthened alliance" with the U.S., they would meet the same miserable fate as the Park Geun Hye group of traitors did.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Release Reunification Champions
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Release Reunification Champions
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean judiciary recently staged a final trial against a citizen on an appeal at the Seoul High Court, at which they sentenced the citizen to five years in prison on charge of the violation of the "Security Law" (SL).
					 The person posted on a website an article praising the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and called for reunifying the country through alliance with the north.
					
					 Earlier, the judiciary gave a three-year jail sentence to a father who was prosecuted on the suspicion of "espionage" during traitor Park Geun Hye's office.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun says in a commentary Tuesday that it is an intolerable challenge to the mindset of the south Korean public who staged the candlelight struggle against the dictatorship and for new politics and life, and an anachronistic reckless act of swimming against the trend of the times towards the national reconciliation and unity and the reunification through alliance with the north.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities outwardly call for improved north-south ties but inwardly put those advocating independent reunification behind bars. This is an expression of their will for confrontation with the DPRK. In other words, it is little short of declaration of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, indifferent to improving the north-south relations like the conservative forces.
					
					 If they truly wish the north-south relations to be improved, they should get rid of the confrontation policy of the predecessor and repeal the SL hostile to the fellow countrymen and set free the unreasonably detained pro-reunification champions.
					
					 Those who are hell-bent on the fascist dictatorship and confrontation, going against the public demand for independence, democracy and reunification are fated to face a stern punishment by history. This is proved by the miserable fate of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better stop their foolish acts, drawing a lesson from the tragic fate of Park.

articles.title: Mass Struggle against THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Mass Struggle against THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- An all-people action for peace was staged in Seoul on June 24 to protest the U.S. THAAD deployment, under the sponsorship of the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 Attending it were thousands of inhabitants from Songju County and Kimchon City of North Kyongsang Province and other parts of south Korea.
					
					 Speakers at a rally said the present "government" should inform the U.S. of the will of the south Korean people opposing the deployment of THAAD as befitting the "government" established by the candlelight resistance.
					
					 They urged the U.S. president to withdraw THAAD, stressing that its deployment is an illegal deed as it failed to go through legal procedures and public discussion.
					
					 At the end of the rally its participants marched through different streets to surround the U.S. embassy in human-chains.
					
					 Earlier on June 21, the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul, calling upon the citizens to take active part in the human-chain demonstration against the THAAD deployment.
					
					 The organization urged the "government" to attach priority to the people's peace, security and basic rights and resolutely reject the unjust deployment of THAAD by the U.S.

articles.title: Punishment of Those Who Suppressed Persons of Culture and Arts Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Those Who Suppressed Persons of Culture and Arts Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of Culture and Arts for the Abolition of Evils and Cultural Democracy in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 20, urging the punishment of those who drew the blacklist to crack down upon persons of culture and arts.
					 The organization expressed dissatisfaction over the investigation of the Board of Audit and Inspection related to the blacklist of the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism, contending that a total inspection should be made of the Chongwadae gentries and the "Intelligence Service" under Park Geun Hye's rule.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Declares Campaign against Part-time Jobs in Educational Field
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Declares Campaign against Part-time Jobs in Educational Field
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean School Part-time Job Solidarity Council held a news conference on June 21, at which it expressed the will to stage a campaign for the abolition of part-time jobs in the educational field, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers at the conference declared that they would wage the struggle against part-time jobs, with the start of general strikes before city and provincial educational offices as a momentum.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Wage Hike
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Wage Hike
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for the Minimum Wage Ten Thousand Won and Abolition of Part-time Jobs in south Korea reportedly held a press conference on June 21 in Seoul, appealing to the public to join the campaign for minimum wage hike and abolition of part-time jobs.
					 Saying that workers are struggling with a resolution to get rid of the evils of tycoons refusing to increase their wage, speakers at the conference called for building a world where the popular masses truly enjoy their life.
					
					 They set the intensive action period from that day to June 30 and expressed their will to go on a general strike.
					
					 An appeal was read out at the conference. Noting that students and youths decided to join the general strike of part-timers, the appeal called on citizens to join and support it.

articles.title: More Crimes of Park Geun Hye's Group Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Crimes of Park Geun Hye's Group Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed again during the trial for traitor Park Geun Hye that she embezzled an incredible amount of funds with Choe Sun Sil, according to new reports from south Korea.
					 They made the regime offer funds to other country in 2015 and then embezzled huge amount of them by forging documents.

articles.title: Remarks of Japan's Governor of Ishikawa Prefecture Flailed
articles.content:
Remarks of Japan's Governor of Ishikawa Prefecture Flailed
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Masanori Tanimoto, governor of Ishikawa Prefecture of Japan, spat out extremely chauvinist remarks denying the sovereignty of the DPRK and the right to existence of the Korean people on June 21.
					 He found fault with the DPRK's just bolstering capability for self-defence at a meeting of cho heads in the prefecture. Even he dared hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, stressing the need to "block north Korea." He unhesitatingly said "it was necessary to starve the north Koreans to death."
					
					 On June 22, he appeared in a press conference to utter that "it is necessary to create circumstances where the north Korean system collapses," far from making an apology for his violent remarks in the face of criticism from the public. 
					
					 The General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan are now strongly protesting his reckless remarks hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and inciting the annihilation of Korean people.
					
					 On June 22, officials of the Central Standing Committee, all headquarters, central organs and business groups of Chongryon sent protest telegrams and faxes to the governor in denunciation of the criminal nature and gravity of his reckless remarks and demanded immediate apology.
					
					 On June 23, chairmen of the Ishikawa, Fukui and Toyama prefectural headquarters of Chongryon formed a protest group and went to the Ishikawa Prefecture Office to convey a protest letter to the governor.
					
					 The letter of protest branded the unpardonable remarks of the governor as unprecedented ones calling for massacre of DPRK citizens which remind one of genocide by Nazis and the massacre of Koreans at the great Kanto earthquake.
					
					 It urged the governor to honestly reflect on his foolish behavior as the head of a self-governing body and make an apology and neither repeat such mistake again nor incite confrontation between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 The chairmen held a press conference and made public the letter of protest.
					
					 Meanwhile, Japanese from all walks of life reportedly raise the voices denouncing the inhumane remarks of the governor as "inhumane and improper remarks to use life of people as lever of pressure" and "remarks devoid of humanism", claiming that his remarks would cause a sensation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 A book releasing ceremony was held on June 16.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sweden
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A Swedish committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Stockholm on June 16.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, an executive member of the Goteborg Committee of the Communist Party of Sweden and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairpersons of the remembrance committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries dedicated articles to the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea between May 30 and June 14.
					 The Egyptian paper Al Akhbar Almassay noted in an article that leader Kim Jong Il had guided the WPK to constantly embody the Juche Idea created by President Kim Il Sung, regarding it as its steadfast guidelines.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 He made sure that the Party follows only one idea, the Juche idea and solves all the problems arising in the Party building and activities as required by the idea and intention of the President.
					
					 He also built up the WPK into an invincible party that has achieved steel-like unity centered on the leader and the one deeply rooted among the masses.
					
					 India's paper Awaking stressed in an article that Kim Jong Il set the single-minded unity as the mainstay of revolution and cemented the unity of the Korean society with the army as its core under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Election Times and Indonesia's paper International Media and internet paper RMOL praised the feats of Kim Jong Il for party building and introduced the history of his guidance over the WPK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties and personages of different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) between June 12 and 23.
					 Among them were a Nigerian delegation of political parties, the first vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran and his party, the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee who is chairman of the Bangladesh Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the pictures of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, the first vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party and others said that June 19 when Kim Jong Il started his work at the WPK Central Committee is a very significant day not only for the WPK but also for all the progressive political parties of the world. They paid the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to the development of the WPK.
					
					 The brilliant successes the WPK gained in the struggle to realize independence of the popular masses under his wise guidance serve as a valuable example for parties and peoples of the countries struggling to build a new society, they stressed.
					
					 Meanwhile, on June 17 the president of the Socialist Party of Benin sent a bouquet to the DPRK Embassy in Cotonou.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua efectos de sequia en el distrito de Hwangju
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua efectos de sequia en el distrito de Hwangju
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju se cercioro en el terreno de la magnitud de danos de la sequia en el distrito de Hwangju de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					  Recorriendo las Granjas Cooperativas de Sokjong y Ryongchon del mismo distrito, estimulo a los funcionarios y trabajadores enfrascados en el trabajo por aliviar los efectos de sequia.
					
					  En las reuniones de consulta efectuadas en el terreno, se tomaron las medidas para aplicar activamente en esa campana los eficientes metodos acompanados del uso de agua nutritiva y buscar todas las posibles fuentes de agua y utilizarlas al maximo.
					
					Se les asigno a los ministerios y organos centrales la tarea de suministrar con preferencia los medios de transporte y los materiales necesarios al combate a la sequia.

articles.title: CC del PTC felicita el Partido del Pueblo de Camboya
articles.content:
CC del PTC felicita el Partido del Pueblo de Camboya
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 27 un mensaje de felicitacion al CC del Partido del Pueblo de Camboya con motivo del aniversario 66 de la fundacion de esta organizacion politica.
					La misiva senala que el CC del PTC esta complacido de que el PPC haya logrado notables exitos en las labores para realizar la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y lograr el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Convencido de que en el futuro tambien se sigan desarrollando las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, formula voto por mayores exitos en las actividades del PPC para fortalecer la organizacion y construir Camboya prospera.

articles.title: Embajador indonesio ofrece banquete con motivo del fin de Ramadan
articles.content:
Embajador indonesio ofrece banquete con motivo del fin de Ramadan
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del fin de Ramadan, el embajador indonesio en Corea, Bambang Hiendrasto, ofrecio la vispera en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang una recepcion en representacion de las embajadas de los paises miembros de la Organizacion de Cooperacion Islamica en Corea.
					Fueron invitados a la ocasion el vicecanciller Choe Hui Chol, los funcionarios interesados, los representantes y los interinos de las misiones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC.
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion los embajadores de Indonesia, Siria, Iran, Palestina y Egipto, los encargados de negocios a.i de Nigeria y Pakistan, los miembros de las embajadas de esos paises y sus familiares. 
					
					Hubo intervenciones en la ocasion.
					
					El vicecanciller coreano dijo que bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos defienden la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana frustrando rotundamente las tentativas de sancion y presion de las fuerzas hostiles y registran nuevos milagros en todos los sectores de la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Expuso la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de seguir ampliando y desarrollando en todos los dominios y conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo las relaciones de amistad y colaboracion con los paises miembros de la Organizacion de Cooperacion Islamica que tienen una larga historia y tradicion.
					
					Los representantes diplomaticos manifestaron la voluntad de esforzarse mucho por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la RPDC, independientemente del cambio de la situacion.
